website_summaries.verdict: A top competitor that will fit a variety of larger grills up to 70 inches wide. Water-repelling fabric keeps the grill dry and protected underneath.
pros: A more rugged construction lends extra durability to this cover while keeping the weight and flexibility around the same as other options
cons: Might require extra care in extremely hot sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last if Fully Expose to the Elements
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not seem to have proper UV protection. After about 18 months of being fully expose to the elements it becomes very fragile and starts to easily ripe (as shown in the photos) when handled.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Kubina

customer_reviews.title: The grill cover to beat all grill covers
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we did not keep this cover because Classic Accessories did not make a matching umbrella cover for our style of canteliever umbrella. But this was an amazing cover. It's super heavy, double stitched, vented. The bottom elastic closure didn't work really well, and the leg loops were nice if you have a grill with legs. I wish it had a center cinch strap with buckles to allow you to tuck the cover under the side shelves. I may add this to the one I have. The buckles would allow you to quickly undo it without having to reset it everytime (hint, hint). I'm guessing these are modeled on the Weber grills.
customer_reviews.author: aldridgec

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, style, color and features
customer_reviews.text: The size of this cover works well with my old Char-Broil gas grill. The tie-down straps work well to keep it from flying away in windy conditions. I love the two sewn-in handles on the top which help lifting off the cover. The tan color is great -- it matches my house -- though that won't be true for everyone. The material is heavy and stands up well to freezing winter conditions -- though I'm sure I could easily crack it if not careful taking it off during the super cold days.
customer_reviews.author: danno718

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice grill cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cover from this company we have purchased. The first one lasted for many years on an open deck with constant southern sun exposure. It finally tore at the corner, but that was due more to my error. I purchased a cover that was exactly the measurement of the grill. It was too tight a fit. My husband had to struggle to get the cover on the grill each time he used it. I bought a size larger this time and he is very happy with it. I don't expect to have any tearing at the corners now because there isn't any stress on the corners and the cover is made very well. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: keikismom

customer_reviews.title: Looked great for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I live in Pennsylvania and my grill is exposed to the elements year round. This cover looked great for the first 6 months then it started to fade. After the first year it got a tear on top (not sure how it happened) which i repaired with gorilla tape from the inside and you really don't notice it so I really didn't care. Today as I was removing it by the handle it developed a huge tear right on the seam by the handle, It looks like the thread or the material has just disintegrated. I am going to try the warranty process and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: ChefEd

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a year in Wisconsin sun.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for it to year from being weathered. Those pictures in another person's review look like my cover. I'm in Northern Wisconsin. Mine ripped like dry and brittle paper. I bandaged with gorilla tape on under side and sprayed the wounds with Flex Seal spray. I tend to forget about warranties on things like this, but it does have limited lifetime warranty. I hope the warranty covers sun damage. Looks nice for about 3 months, then fades. If you use under a covered area, great. But then why would you need to own a cover?
customer_reviews.author: Original Thrash Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Bought again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same 3-years ago and it lasted 3 years. After 3 years under the winter snow and summer sun, it started to rip. So I bought the same. It will probably last another 3 years. I can’t expect this to last any more than 3 years. Even the grill’s steel starts to rust under those conditions in 3 years, so if you are expecting this to last a lifetime, get real. This is probably the best you can find out there IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dikmen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it - They stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: In 2015 I bought the Hickory cover because it has a lifetime warranty. I live in the desert where summer temps are 110 degrees on a regular basis. No piece of fabric is going to be able to hold up to those conditions. After 5 years it was torn and had holes. I filled out the online warranty and was sent a new one, no problem or hassle. I can't ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT GRILL COVER
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a year to write the review on this grill cover as so many others have failed in well less than a year. I live in the Sonoran desert, and the summers are really hot, however, this grill cover has met that challenge and well exceeded my expectations. While it has aged a bit, it shows no signs of the deterioration and ripping like all other covers I have tried. When the time comes, I will buy this grill cover again, but at this rate, it may be a while (hoping I didn't just jinx myself).
customer_reviews.author: azbuck

customer_reviews.title: Fit our Weber Summit S-420 perfect
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits our Weber Summit S-420 perfect really like the handles on both sides and the snaps to go around the wheels on the bottom to keep it in place from the wind. Its made form some nice heavier material and has held up real well so far our grill is on the front porch (North side of the house) which is covered so I'm gonna say it should hold up but we'll see after this winter. The only thing I don't like is the drawstring in the bottom it's elastic so it doesn't really draw tight they need to use a non elastic cord..... but otherwise I would highly recommend this cover.......
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Heavy Duty Cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill cover! The handles make it easy to move, take on/off and hang. Very heavy duty cover (exceeded my expectations). I had no idea that a grill cover could be so nice and so inexpensive. Super bonus is that it's not black! UPDATE: It's only been a month and this cover is becoming sun bleached. The entire top is turning pink. I would of thought it would take a couple of years to sun bleach, not 1 month. Very disappointed as 75% of the reason I bought this was due to the beige color.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, handsome and easy on-off.
customer_reviews.text: We had a flimsy and ripped cover so I particularly wanted a tough replacement. This is perfect with wonderfully placed handles toward each side that makes removal and replacement a piece of cake. It is just a few inches wider than we needed and the size is great for our Weber Grill.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M

customer_reviews.title: Durable but color fades immediately, can't recommend for that reason.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very durable design and construction, this will last for years and hold up to any weather. Cons: It fades very quickly within a month I like the look and construction of the cover as it is thick and durable. The drawback and reason for 2 stars it fades within a month. I have had it about 6 months and it went from the carmel/tan color in the picture to a faded out almost white color. It makes it look like the cover is about 5 years old. It will protect against the elements and keep rain or snow out which it excels at. Just wish it didn't fade so can't recommend as it lots bad once it has faded.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME QUALITY as THREE YEARS AGO ! !
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received this identical product 3 years ago...very thick canvas...would NOT be replacing except for a large tear in previous order caused by vandals. This is NOT NEAR THE QUALITY..."canvas" is way thinner...if I had known, would NOT have reordered.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B.

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Repellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased cover a couple of months ago, but finally put in on grill 3 weeks ago. Pulled it off the grill to cook yesterday and the grill was soaking wet outside and inside. Cover fit well and looks good, but don’t purchase if you’re looking for something to keep the rain out.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernSooner

customer_reviews.title: Plan on buying
customer_reviews.text: New ones every couple of years. They have a warranty that far exceeds how long they will last. Within months, the color is washed out. (The color is great when new) and the hooks to attach to chairs, grills, tables, etc come off. I don’t think we have any better options as to do without is more costly to replace the outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.author: dfwsig

customer_reviews.title: Love this more than the previous model.
customer_reviews.text: The material is as strong as you will find. It will last a few years with full sun. Nothing will last forever. If you can, place the grill where it is under shade so the cover will last you many years. The color and strength is perfect compared to the Veranda line. I also have the Hickory fire pit cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B NoVA

customer_reviews.title: For the price I wanted more
customer_reviews.text: I guess nothing lasts forever, but for the premium price, it should last more than a season. Mine began to fade and tear after a few months. I nursed it along with gorilla tape for the second year. Finally gave up and bought a cheap one at Walmart and it's lasted a season and looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty when new. Last 3 years when stored outdoors.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased our first one July 2, 2016. Per the attached photos, the thread ripped when trying to remove it last week - just about exactly at the three-year mark. It has been on our grill on the south side of our outdoor porch. We bought another one hoping they may have begun using better thread. They look nice when new.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Lohman

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month use it faded; After 9 months it's falling apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: It looked beautiful out of the box, but during use it started to fade within a month. Now 9 months later and it's ripping on several seams, including the bottom panel which has ripped where it ties to the wheels, so it can no longer be secured. It's completely worthless. I have issue with this company for offering prizes to good reviews which slanted the ratings wildly in their favor; a very unethical way to do business in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: chi-love

customer_reviews.title: Only time will tell...
customer_reviews.text: I had the cheaper version of this grill cover, (not the same brand) and it lasted about 3-years. So I decided to spend about $20 more and upgrade to this one. I can tell the quality is much better and it come with a limited-life-time warranty. Only time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Bam~Bam

customer_reviews.title: Large Too BIG for Weber Genesis 330
customer_reviews.text: This cover (size Large) was the recommended size for my Weber Genesis 330 grill. I think it is too big. When I put it on, it looks like I just threw a big dropcloth over it. The cinch cord does not help at all. It did not look like the photo in the description. I wanted to like it based on all the good reviews. I really like the material, seems durable. If the BBQ was tucked away in a corner of my yard where I don't see it, I wouldn't care so much, I bought this cover because it was nicer looking and my grill is in plain sight when sitting in the yard. It looks sloppy. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is a great value. I”ve purchased $100 covers that weren’t any better than this one. Only time will tell if it holds up the same or better, but the $100 cover lasted about a year before literally beginning to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for our barbeque. I prefer our cover to make the barbeque disappear against our block wall. The patio looks larger when it doesn't jump out as a big black blob. It does a great job of that plus the quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn P

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight, Durable, Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one that came with the grill after it began to show signs of weather damage. This is a very high quality product with a great look. It is heavyweight and durable. I recommend it and this companies products for all your outdoor covering needs.
customer_reviews.author: Will Deploy

customer_reviews.title: Fades, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Fits well over our oversized grill and is heavy enough to not get blown away in wind storms. We've had this less than 2 years and it has faded significantly. Granted, it sits in direct sunlight 75% of the day, but it still looks unappealing. Another issue is that this is a very bulky cover to put on yourself. There isn't an easy "hold here for easy installation" key so I have to fight with it a bit to figure out which side goes which way. Overall though, for the price, this was a very wise investment. Looks very nice on our patio and I would purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: ARUNNER

customer_reviews.title: Works for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Looks high quality out of the box. Great color, but it faded quickly the first summer in partial sun (4 hours direct sunlight) in the Northeast. Ripped during a thunderstorm and was unusable after 2 years. Was hoping for more longevity.
customer_reviews.author: volbar

customer_reviews.title: My grill looks just like this pic
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave me a Brinkman Grill, no cover, lots of grease. One can cold oven cleaner, two hours and elbow grease it looks like new. Purchased this cover since it mentioned Brinkman by name in the description and the size fit perfectly. Looks exactly like the pic here. Love the color, much better than black and matches the stockade fence in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: PDEUEL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This has worked very well for our grill. It has been exposed to the weather and sun all Summer. It has faded somewhat, but it remains in excellent condition (other than where a mouse or other rodent decided to chew on the fabric!). The weight of the cover and the straps around the bottom are sufficient to keep it in place; we've never bothered to secure it to the base of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stewart

customer_reviews.title: More junk from China
customer_reviews.text: This cover arrived later than I expected, yet looked great and fit the grill perfectly. It seemed very durable and attractive and I thought it would last many years. Unfortunately, it has become useless after less than two years. After this winter passed, I found it torn in several places and it was so weak I could put my finger through it anywhere I attempted to. If you don't mind buying a new one every year, this is for you. Myself, I consider it more junk from China and will try to find one that is made in the USA. My previous cover lasted over 7 years and was a Coleman brand.
customer_reviews.author: B driving alot

customer_reviews.title: fabric did not stand up to northeast winter
customer_reviews.text: live in northeast. after a little over a year, the fabric is cracking and tearing. the bottom does not fix easily so the cover, which is oversized for my grill, can be blown off. overall, the material does not stand up to winter and summer and should not have disintegrated this quickly. disappointed in the quality of the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: fineshmecker

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE>>>>Heavy, tough and should last long time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2016. It is only just know starting to fade from the sun light. Will be buying a new one as in a storm it blew off and it got caught on something sharp and sliced a hole in it. If I had strapped down like I usually do it wouldn't have gotten sliced open. I probably could have gotten away with a large for my four burner grill. This thing is heavy and tough. Only had it spring-summer-fall so far. It gets a lot of sun but does not look like it faded at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tony01902

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like many other grill covers after it sits in the sun for a season it becomes brittle and tears. I live in New England so its not like we have long summers with intense sun like down south. This has happened to my last three grill covers from a variety of manufactures. I guess you get whet you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: IDOC

customer_reviews.title: Fades - a lot - in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover 11 months. I'm impressed with this cover, it's heavy and durable, and it sat outside over the winter here in the Sierra mountains. But it fades, alot. The sun has bleached the top to a light canvas color (similar to a canvas drop cloth), the back side never gets direct sun so it is not faded, and the front is somewhere between the two. It started to fade immediately. I'm thinking of taking it to a laundromat and washing it with heavy bleach to even the color out (this is too large for a home washing machine). But I would buy this again, it's an excellent value. I'll try to post pics.
customer_reviews.author: BluePlato

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The materials appear to be of good quality, this product can only be truly reviewed once it's been used for a long time and shows how it can stand the weather changes, at the end it is a protective device so only time will tell. It was as advertised and looks great once out the box, the measurements were just a bit tight on my grill and that is a concern to me during the winter time as I expect it to be even tighter and can tear against the corners during placement and removal. Will update in a few months. At last, this is a great deal on amazon vs the same product advertised for $200+ on other websites.
customer_reviews.author: AR123

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Got this about two years ago, fits great, looks great - a little faded but... I just notices a hole in it today, not sure how long they should last ... I think I can patch it so it will last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: thisandthat

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Weber Summit grill and could not find a reasonably priced cover locally. Saw this on line and decided to purchased. Have purchased many low price covers so I was not expecting to much. This cover exceeded any expectations that I had. Heavy duty material, straps for two wheels to keep cover on and heavy duty handles to aid in taking cover on and off. Would purchase again with out any second thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: ljzone

customer_reviews.title: The material quality seems excellent but they just don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in Feb 2014 and another in July 2015. The last one I bought was gone in 7 months. I live in Arizona and the sun here is brutal. I think I'll try Amazon basics this next time, they are half this price, and see just how long that lasts, it certainly should beat seven months. I had done a prior review of this cover and was very happy with it because of its construction but I didn't include any longevity and now I have. This cover by the way is in the sun and probably would last longer under a covered porch. But being out in the sun in Arizona seven months is all I got.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Not even 24 months before the rip
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it and when it was ripped, I looked it upend realized it didn't even last 24 months. Very expensive if we look at it on a per month rate.
customer_reviews.author: Marc BB

customer_reviews.title: The cover was very nice when new
customer_reviews.text: The cover was very nice when new. After 1 year, it had faded significantly and lost much of its attraction - I could have lived with it being faded. But it ripped easily during a routine removal with very little stress placed on it. Disappointed. So if you want a cover that will look good for a year and will hold up structurally for maybe 2 years, this may be a good choice. Me...I'd like to get a few more years out of a grill cover, so I'll be opting for a different brand for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: ValueMinded

customer_reviews.title: Other than the color fading issue, it lasted three years
customer_reviews.text: Other than the color fading issue, it lasted three years sitting outside before the plastic inner-liner began to deteriorate and fail. I was happy with it except that the fabric faded as soon as the sun hit it. I liked the tan color but the color was gone in about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does not last over time
customer_reviews.text: This was great right out of the box on my grill but over time the sun has faded the entire top. There are also stains from trees that drop debris. I guess this is to be expected after 9 months and a bad winter. I like the look of the cover when it was new but I think I would buy another black one next time. Update: After two years and harsh winters the cover is shot. It's dried up, brittle and cracking at the seams. I would not recommend this cover considering it lasted just 20 months where as my original cover lasted 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Builtmany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have always purchased the "inexpensive" lightweight covers but with the Santa Ana winds they keep blowing off our grills (we have two, storing one for my son). We decided to go ahead and purchase this one for ours and put the better lightweight on our sons. The quality and weight of this one is amazing. It looks great on our patio too and my husband really liked all the different options to pull this cover tight, but even with the Santa Ana winds blowing strong, just the weight keeps this in place. Wish I had bought this a long time ago and not wasted our money on the lightweight covers.
customer_reviews.author: HollyF

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grille cover. This is my second one. This cover lasted twice as long as any cover that I have owned, so I bought another one. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl  L. Budreau

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This cover never fails to do it's job. I've had 2-3 of them over the past 10 years or so. They only last so long and this make is the best I've found and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Page

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover. We purchased an XXL size for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover. We purchased an XXL size for a grill the manufacturer suggested an L (large) would fit, which it would. The XXL provides additional leaway for ease of taking the cover on and off. The more snug covers always snag on the corners of the grill, which is just a pain. This is a really nice, very heavy cover. Not like the crap vinyl fabric covers that are typically provided by the grill manufactures, as you find at places like Home Depot and Lowes, that last only a year typically.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable cover that fits well
customer_reviews.text: Got the large (64" W) because of the width of bbq and fits nice.. but is a bit too long for the height. Cover touches patio..Other than that it's a very nice durable cover.. handles on each side a plus when taking it off.. Hope it doesn't fade since in direct sunlight most of the day... I'll update on that. UPDATE!! Wound up fading considerably. Is now two tone, one side brown and other pinkish! Gotta Keep it out of direct sunlight I guess. But then what's the point
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: HD Cover, ScotchGuard
customer_reviews.text: April 2014: This cover was more expensive than what I normally buy, but after replacing our 7 year old grill I wanted to protect the new one with something better. This is a very nice heavy duty cover and I hope it holds up well to the Arizona sun. To help protect the cover itself I bought some outdoor fabric protector and sprayed the entire cover with it. A few days later we did get a rain shower and the water was repelled very well. I am hoping this will help with the UV protection as well. Umbrellas and grill covers are lucky to last through 2 Arizona summers so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover was much nicer than I expected. Quality is great - thick, well made, good stitching, handles are solid. All in all, excellent, especially for the price. I ended up buying two more - one for my fire pit and one for another grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Hickory Cart BBQ Grill Cover (Large Size)
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, heavy duty grill cover; the exterior is constructed of high density denier material and lined with PVC material. The built-in handles allow easy on-off application. The vents allow air gusts release so it doesn't lift off the grill, even if you forget to tighten the the cinch ties at the base. The stitching is heavy duty and aligns correctly with the mating pieces and banding. The color (tan with chocolate banding) blends well with any deck/patio decor. A very good grill cover................and a very good price at Amazon (even beating WalMart, BJ's and Costco pricing).
customer_reviews.author: G. Howard

customer_reviews.title: We liked the ease of application and size for our grill ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in December, 2014. In November 2015 we noticed the stitching near the handle had a "pull" in it. With in the next 2 or 3 applications the seam stitching came loose or tore. Now the side is open. The cover is constantly in the sun and it appears the seam deteriorated. This product has a "limited warranty" , I'll update after I contact the manufacturer to see what that means. We liked the ease of application and size for our grill but I don't want to have to replace annually.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: So based on the measurements of my grill I ordered a medium size. What I got seems huge. I don't want to return it for a smaller size since by definition it should be too small given the manufacturer's specs. I will admit the cover seems incredibly well made and should last forever. Assuming it doesn't blow away in a strong wind. It would make a good sail for a boat. But the "hassle-free warranty" registration was so involved that I decided to forego it. I had a lot less hassle registering a John Deere riding mower.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it and as usual AMAZON shipping was super fast. So far this cover meets or exceeds ...
customer_reviews.text: After going through TWO Weber covers for my Weber Genius E-310 gas grill, I stumbled upon this cover from the Masterbuilt Smoker crowd. Ordered it and as usual AMAZON shipping was super fast. So far this cover meets or exceeds my expectations. Time will tell how well it holds up, but even in single digits it was easy to handle and it fit's my E-310 like it was made for it (ordered Large size). I liked it so much I just ordered one for my Mastebuit Electric Smoker. And I'll probably order the patio table/chair cover this fall. Easy to handle and it looks great and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Best grill cover !
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill cover i ever bought ! Made very well. However, 4 star rating is because the size dies run a bit bigger. Large was just a bit bigger then i wanted even thought my grill size was with in large size. My gril is 63" long. So i got medium size that calls for 60" long grill. Its fits perfect, like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Anton U. Alexeev

customer_reviews.title: This was great looking when I got it back in June 2016
customer_reviews.text: This was great looking when I got it back in June 2016. Not quite a full year of having it and it looks like it is 20 years old. Very sun faded, not even close to the same color (I like in the Pacific Northwest where there has been little sun). Did not fully protect the Weber grill I paid $1000 for. Very disappointed in the quality considering the mfg. makes it sound like top notch product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Harris

customer_reviews.title: Hope Lifetime Warranty is for real... (Edit ~2yrs Later & I'm Filing a Claim)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good... Faded pretty quickly & I fully expect to be using the Lifetime Warranty (which is why I chose this cover) OK... ~2yrs later the cover is falling apart... I sent an email to the Company yesterday inquiring how to file a Warranty Claim... Awaiting their Response...
customer_reviews.author: psychodoc

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Great Cover, very heavy. A little long for my grill but with hem cord you can tighten down and it lifts it up a little. Used all summer in the Sun and am 1/2 way through the winter and it has stood up well.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Cover your grill the right way...
customer_reviews.text: This is one Heavy Duty cover with waterproofed stitching all around and an elastic band and clips to secure the cover to the bottom legs and base of your BBQ. Finding something better will be almost impossible for the money, because this baby is built to last. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a true to size, Heavy Duty BBQ cover! In addition, the lighter color helps prevent the suns rays from deteriorating the material. This is a cover that even my Father appreciates!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover and have had different ones for years. It is a great weight and easy to take on and off. Color is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for WIlmington grill
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a Larger 64 inch, fits Wilmington grill perfect. No chemical China smell, like they say its all Prop 65 compliant.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded most optimistic expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely outstanding quality is n every way. Had it for almost 2 years now, been thru 2 Pacific NW winters with it covering my grill, and it is BUILT RIGHT!!! Wish I could get custom sizes for some other items, cuz these babies are fantastic. Would give it 10 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest Guy

customer_reviews.title: Grill cover will not blow off in windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Grill cover fits my grill well and will not blow off in windy weather (I am not talking about extreme wind conditions). This is the second grill cover of this type I have bought. A second review for a third grill cover, this product is made in China. The cover is outside on my grill year round and begins to rot in 2 to 3 years. I pay no attention to the "warranty".
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good if not in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought five years ago for a Weber grill. Worked well, except for exposure to UV. The side that was exposed to the afternoon sun faded and ripped after about four years. That said for the money it wasn’t a bad investment. This year though I purchased a different version from another supplier. Will see how this one goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first cover failed after only two years. Developed small pinholes, which proceeded into large tears due to wind and usage. I requested a warranty replacement and received replacement in about 1 week. Fantastic customer service! I still love the product and will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cawley

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking grill cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking grill cover. We had it on a deck in full sun and within 50 yards of salt water. It lasted one year but was only outdoors 7 months out of twelve. It faded in six months and the top split open around month seven.. Despite its short lifespan, we are ordering another one because it looks great on our deck and I don't expect fabric to hold up under Florida coastal sun unless specifically treated with sun guard. Further the price is reasonable. If it lasted a couple of years I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: gden

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last 2 Years Here in Virginia
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Faded and started ripping. Maybe I should look into that "Limited Lifetime Warrany" that the description is advertising. Purchased in Dec. 2015. Wow, quality isn't what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: This item shipped on 8/14/2015, not sure when I ...
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped on 8/14/2015, not sure when I received it but it is no longer the same color which is not that much of a problem ,bur it has ripped about 6 inches above the left handle and this is probably going to continue. I have been very careful with it, taking in off and putting it on. So much for a lifetime guarantee. I actually had it less than a year. If photos are needed,let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This cover is proving to be just okay. When I first got it, it seemed well made and fit perfectly but after just one year it is becoming very faded and the fabric is starting to deteriorate. It appears that it won’t last maybe another year. Before I got this cover I had a cheap one from Wal-Mart and although it didn’t fit very well, it lasted several years. I would not recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: MerryDJ

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover one year ago almost to the day and it is totally faded and falling apart. Don't waste your money. I'm not even going to bother with trying to get it replaced under warranty because I don't want another one. The previous Hickory edition cover I bought lasted 3 years so clearly there is some cost cutting going on with this company's products. Complete junk!
customer_reviews.author: CatinSeattle

customer_reviews.title: For a 60" Craftsman deluxe grill.
customer_reviews.text: A Craftsman deluxe 60" grill was my reason for getting this cover. (The Sear's cover was ugly. I didn't want plain black or the light tan colors - and the really cool ones were $70-$90 with shipping.) I was very pleased with the quality of this one. The quality of the canvas material was better than I expected and the light brown with accent stripe looks good. They say it is 61" but is probably 1-2" longer because I had plenty of room left going over the 60" Craftsman (I'm very disappointed with the Sear's grill). I wish I could give you 5 years experience but this is a very good start!
customer_reviews.author: T Rosh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I wish it was a few inches shorter as it hangs on the ground. Could not find a grill cover this color that fit my New Weber Genesis. Did not want the Weber Black cover. so this was my next best choice. This was the second of these covers i have purchased. I still have the first that fit my old grill and is still in great condition after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far this product lives up to the description. I'll know more after we go through a winter (this was written after just a few months). So now it has been 2 years and this product has completely ripped apart under the weather. We live where it gets hot in the summers (85 to 95 degrees) and my grill sits on my deck in the sun. It is a mess and I'm hoping the company will replace it after just 2 summers. .
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Size not as described
customer_reviews.text: The actual size is not as listed. Hence, the cover doesn't fit as it shoul. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: GWM

customer_reviews.title: Fades quickly and shredded all over in less than two years
customer_reviews.text: This cover looked fantastic when we first got it in June 2015. After a few months outside it started to fade. After a year it began to get a tear in it, and now it is so shredded there is just no point in keeping it on anymore. I’m extremely disappointed in this cover, especially since it has so many positive ratings..
customer_reviews.author: foxmcgee

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty really = 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: I received this grill cover in April of 2014. After two and a half years outside (desert) the seam at the side handle ripped when putting the cover back on the grill. The product indicates a Lifetime Warranty. I have not contacted Amazon yet (but I will) to see if a replacement cover will be sent. It was a good cover while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: 1st Cover last only a few years, Classic great about replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got aged out after a couple of years (I live in SoCal by the beach with a south/west exposure). But Classic was GREAT about honoring their warranty and replaced it as soon as I sent pictures of the damaged cover.
customer_reviews.author: WHTNUKL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he constantly has trouble with the cheaper brands ripping and flying off in the wind. He really likes this. Its super heavy duty and the straps on the bottom do a great job of keeping it in place. It cleans easily and looks really nice. Sits in a somewhat sunny spot and has not faded at all yet. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my dual gas, charcoal grill. So far it has protected my grill from all the rain we are having. Quality of the fabric is sturdy, better then what I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Our grill is pretty big so the 64" wide just barely fit over ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is built well, heavy duty and waterproof. Our grill is pretty big so the 64" wide just barely fit over the ends. After a year the cover faded, which doesn't bother me, but it became very stiff, and fragile. After about a year and a half it eventually ripped when I was taking it off. This is why I only gave it 3 stars. I expected it to last longer than a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: M. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Have had it for 16 months and it has dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for 16 months and it has dry rot and ripped on the corner. Been installing it this way since we purchased it and never a problem, Dry rot has done it in. Can't beat the price and the quality and workmanship. Just need a material that lasts in sun and weather. Will buy another one with the understanding it is a short term item.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Baker

customer_reviews.title: BBq cover
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had the first bbq cover for 3 years and held up well. Fading, of course but to be expected. Good price for quality.
customer_reviews.author: dave volk

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate,  but this cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy material, best grill cover I've ever purchased. Time will tell on durability. My grill is on a south facing deck, so will see how it performs with the sun.
customer_reviews.author: RonG-Longmont

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor BBQ Grill Cover Beats All
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is lighter weight than 5-year-old cover being replaced, but neat appearance is the same as pictured and construction seems to be as solid. Cover being replaced held up superbly considering its constant exposure to CO wet/dry weather - annual temps ranging from freezing to over 100 degrees - and high-level UVs. Lighter weight is a plus for manageability. Hope it lasts as long as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: what I found is

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within a month!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This cover ripped at the seams within a few weeks if very light use! In fact, it ripped while on the grilled untouched! The ties at the bottom are useless, as the cover went off flying to the neighbors yard all the time. Buy yourself something better than this cheap Chinese rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover.
customer_reviews.text: Have used over a year now and the cover is the best I’ve used. Well made and fits great. With any cover you must be careful with sharp edges. This cover is sturdy and has not faded.
customer_reviews.author: WSW

customer_reviews.title: Good covers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these covers. The first is several years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased, excellent quality, reviews were good. Handles are cloth, which was one reason we chose this cover. Reviews of covers with rubber handles all said they deteriorate quickly. This has a draw string bottom and air flaps. so far so good, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: First of all I received this item in less than 24 hours. The quality of this product is exceptional. It truly appears to be very durable, and I expect it to last many years. It was a perfect fit for my grill. I would highly recommend this product to anyone interested in protecting there grill.
customer_reviews.author: lomein

customer_reviews.title: This cover was OK for about 6 months then turned to paper.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: DO NOT BUY THIS. I am always skeptical of negative (and overly positive) product reviews, but I overlooked the warnings on this one and got burned. Unless you will be keeping your grill cover indoors or out of the elements, it will be in the garbage in 12 months tops! Cover arrived with rusted insignia and loose stitching sticking out in multiple places. Not worth returning since the rust is probably inevitable and hanging strings in stitching does not seem to affect functionality. Otherwise this is a nice looking cover, made with seemingly durable fabric. (See updated review above and DO NOT BUY!)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Weber Genesis E-330 (Medium)
customer_reviews.text: Recently received this cover, ordered in medium size and it is a perfect fit, very snug on all sides. The additions of the side handle, draw string, and buckle helps to keep the cover from blowing off. The material is very heavy and thick and seems like it is much better then the original Weber grill cover. It recently rained and the water beaded well on the cover. Would definitely recommend over the Weber cover as this seems like it is much better quality and last longer then the vinyl material that Weber has used.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I must have for my sacred Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Really well-made and love this cover. This is the second one I ordered. The first one faded and started tearing after about four years sitting outside and all seasons here in Montana.
customer_reviews.author: J. Salvino

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a new Infrared grill and decided a new grill should have a new cover. I researched many covers because in the past they looked good but did not hold up. When this cover arrived and I took it out of the box I knew it was the right one. I researched this cover and brand and everything that I read sounded great. I have my new grill and have this cover on it. This covers my grill completely and has outstanding tie downs. You will not go wrong with this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Unless you store your grill indoors, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is the best looking and best fit for my grill. Unless you store your grill in the house this product will not last more than six months. This is the second one I got. After my first one fell apart after six months I thought I just got a bad one but the new one is going the same way. Granted this product is subjected to the Texas sun, so unless you live up north or store your grill indoors look for something else. If you find one that looks and fits as well as this one but lasts longer, let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it's been 2 years before this review.. Only because I had read some negative ones about this cover and wanted to be fair. It sucks!! Going into our 3rd season (and I didn't have it a full 1st) it's tearinf to shreads worse than paper! Don't bother with it.. I can buy a cheap plastic one that will last at least a year longer! This one is too expensive to have to replace! Sorry
customer_reviews.author: R. Willette

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty thick Cordura with nice tie downs to keep from blowing off the grill in heavy winds. large is a little big for a 4-burner Char-broil but it was $20 cheaper on Amazon than the Medium. Plan to buy additional covers for smoker and patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: BEST COVER I'VE EVER OWNED OR SEEN!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the cover on for about a month. The quality is outstanding! The look is great! It's covering a Weber Genesis 330. I'll update with pics and any changes as time passes
customer_reviews.author: BucNcRaZy

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the good looks fool you.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with the apparently durable fabric and overall appearance of the cover. After the first full summer, the fabric had faded. After the first full (northern Virginia) winter, the material was brittle and full of rips. I noticed the grill itself was full of rust, so I assume the fabric did nothing to prevent repeated exposure to rain. I bought a matching cover for a fire pit, which had exactly the same result - disintegrated cover and ruined fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Whomsley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Covered the grill keeps it out of the weather well fitted
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Water resistance, no fading, no blowing away in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits! Well, good enough for us, that is.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the small grill cover for our 2 burner Weber Spirit ii, and we were not entirely sure it would fit. Turns out it works! I don't think it was meant to sit on the grill the way it does on ours, but it doesn't look bad to us and it is protecting the grill. So far, we are very happy with it. The measurements of our grill our about 46" wide, 27-28" deep, and about 43" tall.
customer_reviews.author: The Hetheringtons

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Hickory Water-Resistant 70 Inch BBQ Grill Cover
product_meta.description: Size:X-LargeClassic Accessories Hickory BBQ Grill Cover, XL
feature_bullets: PREMIUM GRILL COVERS: Guaranteed to fit barbecue grills 70"L x 24"D x 48"H
WEBER GRILL COVER: Fits Weber Grills along with many other popular brands (Brinkmann, CharBroil, Jenn Air, etc)
BBQ COVERS with WARRANTY: Limited lifetime warranty

WATER REPELLENT ALL WEATHER PROTECTION: Weather10 fabric and rot resistant Weather Leather trim keeps your outdoor patio furniture dry and safe with a protective water repellent and wipe clean 6P Free and EU REACH compliant undercoating
Weber is a registered trademark of Weber-Stephen Products LLC; Classic Accessories is not affiliated or associated with Weber-Stephen Products, LLC or its products in any way

DURABLE COVER WITH ADVANCED FEATURES: Air vents reduce mold and mildew-causing moisture while preventing wind-lofting, padded handles for easy fitting and removal, heavy-duty fabric and tough interlocking seams add strength and durability
Not designed to entirely cover the wheels or legs
CUSTOM-FIT BARBECUE COVER: Click-close straps snap around legs to secure cover on the windiest days while an elastic hem cord with a toggle allows adjustment for a tight and custom-like fit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,246 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
